Hero.title: Hey there! I'm
Hero.description: Many know me as 'Franz'. I'm a <age></age> year old Computer Science student who is always eager to learn new things and get involved in different challenges.

About.title: About Me
About.description: I am a university student with a distinguished academic career, awarded multiple times for my outstanding performance, maintaining an average above 95 points in all semesters completed. I am motivated by continuous learning and consider myself proactive, creative, and results-oriented. My commitment to excellence and efficiency has allowed me to develop social skills and a passion for the projects I undertake, approaching them with critical thinking and strong problem-solving abilities. I have participated in Franklin Covey leadership programs and volunteered in social action, fintech, and entrepreneurial initiatives.

suizo.title: Colegio Suizo Americano
suizo.description: I studied all my life at this school. I graduated with a High School diploma in Science and Letters with a focus on Computing. I maintained an average of 95 points.

uvg.title: University of the Valley of Guatemala
uvg.description: Currently studying <bold>Computer Science and Information Technology Engineering</bold>, earning multiple diplomas for outstanding academic performance.

usask.title: University of Saskatchewan
usask.description: I had the opportunity to participate in an exchange to Saskatoon, Canada, through the <bold>Emerging Leaders in the Americas Program (ELAP)</bold> scholarship.

guatemaltek.title: Systems Integration and Event Driven Architecture

aws-101.title: Cloud Technologies and Server Creation with AWS
aws-101.issuer: University of the Valley of Guatemala

exchanges.title: Student Exchanges UVG
exchanges.description: A Web Platform for the University of the Valley of Guatemala that allows the Internationalization Department to manage the student exchange process. It includes the management of students, universities, and the application process.
